name: Liminal Exploration
description:
A liminal cursed adventure by TM with music by CicadaSirens (https://twitter.com/cicadasirens)

The painful adventure of a salamander through different worlds as the unknown pushes you forward.

The full OST can be found on Cicada's soundcloud https://soundcloud.com/cicada_sirens

Controls

Left Arm 
(Hold to grab objects and click to interact)Left Click/EL1/LT Right Arm
(Use Equipped Tool)Right Click/QR1/RTChange Tool
(Rope and Thruster)1/2DpadVerticalUse Power
(Shoot the shit)
Middle Click/Ctrl
R2/RBRunShiftL3/Lstick
